      • modifyText

        public void modifyText(java.lang.String text,
              int type)
        Method to get text updating the kind of view selected: TEI, Header or text.

        Does not take in account bad formed TEI errors.

        Parameters:
        text - String to show as notification, if empty, no notification is shown.
        type - Type of view selected. Can be TYPE_HEADER for only showing the Header, TYPE_TEXT for only showing text, or TYPE_TEI for showing whole file. If type of view is not selected, whole TEI file is shown.

      • modifyText

        public void modifyText(java.lang.String text,
              boolean showError)
        Method to get text using the last view selected.
        Parameters:
        text - String to show as notification, if empty, no notification is shown.
        showError - true to show error notification or false to not.

        public void setCursorPosition()
